channel.title: Nodule on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Nodule on funPlantGenes

item.title: Cm-ERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: GmACP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18g244300 Gene Symbol: GmACP Gene Name: acyl carrier protein Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: GmFWL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G187000 Gene Symbol: GmFWL1 Gene Name: FW2-2-like1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The GmFWL1 (FW2-2-like) nodulation gene encodes a plasma membrane microdomain-associated protein.

item.title: GmMaT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G258000 Gene Symbol: GmMaT2 Gene Name: malonyl-CoA acyltransferase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Isoflavone malonyl-CoA acyltransferase GmMaT2 is involved in nodulation of soybean by modifying synthesis and secretion of isoflavones.

item.title: GmMAX2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmMAX2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMAX2a restored atmax2 root hair defects and soybean root hairs were changed in GmMAX2a overexpression (GmMAX2a-OE) or knockdown (GmMAX2a-KD) mutants.

item.title: GmN70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmN70 Gene Name: Nitrate and chloride transporter Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmN70 and LjN70.

item.title: GmPpcK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPpcK1 Gene Name: phosphoenolpyruvate-carboxylase kinase1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Although the GmPpcK1–4 transcripts are all expressed throughout nodule development, only the nearly identical GmPpcK2/3 homologs are nodule-enhanced and up-/down-regulated in vivo by photosynthate supply from the shoots.

item.title: GmPpcK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPpcK2 Gene Name: phosphoenolpyruvate-carboxylase kinase2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Although the GmPpcK1–4 transcripts are all expressed throughout nodule development, only the nearly identical GmPpcK2/3 homologs are nodule-enhanced and up-/down-regulated in vivo by photosynthate supply from the shoots.

item.title: GmPpcK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPpcK3 Gene Name: phosphoenolpyruvate-carboxylase kinase3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Although the GmPpcK1–4 transcripts are all expressed throughout nodule development, only the nearly identical GmPpcK2/3 homologs are nodule-enhanced and up-/down-regulated in vivo by photosynthate supply from the shoots.

item.title: GmPpcK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPpcK4 Gene Name: phosphoenolpyruvate-carboxylase kinase4 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Although the GmPpcK1–4 transcripts are all expressed throughout nodule development, only the nearly identical GmPpcK2/3 homologs are nodule-enhanced and up-/down-regulated in vivo by photosynthate supply from the shoots.

item.title: GmPT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPT7 Gene Name: phosphate transporter 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A nodule-localized phosphate transporter GmPT7 plays an important role in enhancing symbiotic N2 fixation and yield in soybean.

item.title: GmSPX8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmSPX8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSPX8, a nodule-localized regulator confers nodule development and nitrogen fixation under phosphorus starvation in soybean.

item.title: GmSTF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G092700 Gene Symbol: GmSTF3 Gene Name: HYPOCOTYL5 orthologs TGACG-motif binding factors 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Shoot-to-root communication via GmUVR8-GmSTF3 photosignaling and flavonoid biosynthesis fine-tunes soybean nodulation under UV-B light.

item.title: GmUVR8a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G209600 Gene Symbol: GmUVR8a Gene Name: UV-B receptor a Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We clarify a fine-tuning mechanism in response to ultraviolet B (UV-B) irradiation and rhizobia infection, involving GmUVR8-dependent UV-B perception and GmSTF3/4-GmMYB12-GmCHS-mediated (iso)flavonoid biosynthesis for soybean nodule formation.

item.title: GmUVR8b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G194400 Gene Symbol: GmUVR8b Gene Name: UV-B receptor b Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We clarify a fine-tuning mechanism in response to ultraviolet B (UV-B) irradiation and rhizobia infection, involving GmUVR8-dependent UV-B perception and GmSTF3/4-GmMYB12-GmCHS-mediated (iso)flavonoid biosynthesis for soybean nodule formation.

item.title: GmUVR8c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06G156400 Gene Symbol: GmUVR8c Gene Name: UV-B receptor c Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We clarify a fine-tuning mechanism in response to ultraviolet B (UV-B) irradiation and rhizobia infection, involving GmUVR8-dependent UV-B perception and GmSTF3/4-GmMYB12-GmCHS-mediated (iso)flavonoid biosynthesis for soybean nodule formation.

item.title: GmVTL1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G076300 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1b Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a and GmVTL1b are specifically expressed in the fixation zone of soybean nodules.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYUC2a mediates auxin biosynthesis during root development and nodulation in soybean.

item.title: LjENOD40–1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjENOD40–1 Gene Name: early nodulin-1 protein Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Two ENOD40 genes of L.

item.title: LjENOD40–2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjENOD40–2 Gene Name: early nodulin-2 protein Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Two ENOD40 genes of L.

item.title: LjERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjERF1 Gene Name: transcription factor AP2-EREBP Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: A Positive Regulatory Role for LjERF1 in the Nodulation Process Is Revealed by Systematic Analysis of Nodule-Associated Transcription Factors of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjIPT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjIPT3 Gene Name: isopentenyltransferase3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Knockdown of LjIPT3 influences nodule development in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjMATE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMATE1 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion (MATE) protein1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjMATE1: A Citrate Transporter Responsible for Iron Supply to the Nodule Infection Zone of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjMOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CM2163.80 Gene Symbol: LjMOT1 Gene Name: molybdate transporter 1 Genome: L.

item.title: LjNRT2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj1g3v3646440.1 Gene Symbol: LjNRT2.4 Gene Name: Genome: genomic assembly build 3.

item.title: LjSYP32-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjSYP32-1 Gene Name: Sed5 -like SNARE Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: We identified a Sed5 -like clone LjSYP32-1 which contributes to nodule tissue formation and plant growth in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MsSPSA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsSPSA Gene Name: sucrose phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: Nodule-enhanced expression of a sucrose phosphate synthase gene member (MsSPSA) has a role in carbon and nitrogen metabolism in the nodules of alfalfa.

item.title: MtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix loop helix 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtbHLH1, a bHLH transcription factor involved in Medicago truncatula nodule vascular patterning and nodule to plant metabolic exchanges.

item.title: MtCOPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g019870 Gene Symbol: MtCOPT1 Gene Name: COPT transporter 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Medicago truncatula copper transporter 1 (MtCOPT1) delivers copper for symbiotic nitrogen fixation.

item.title: MtCRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17Chr8g0392301 Gene Symbol: MtCRE1 Gene Name: Cytokinin Response Element 1 Genome: M.

item.title: MtEFD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr4g0002631 Gene Symbol: MtEFD Gene Name: Ethylene response Factor required for nodule Differentiation Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtEFD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr4g0002631;MT0064_00055 Gene Symbol: MtEFD Gene Name: Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtEFD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr3g0137174 Gene Symbol: MtEFD2 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR REQUIRED FOR NODULE DIFFERENTIATION 2 Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtERF74
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr2g105380 Gene Symbol: MtERF74 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula ERF-VII TF 74 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Group VII ethylene response factors, MtERF74 and MtERF75, sustain nitrogen fixation in Medicago truncatula microoxic nodules.

item.title: MtERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g022820 Gene Symbol: MtERF75 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula ERF-VII TF 75 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Group VII ethylene response factors, MtERF74 and MtERF75, sustain nitrogen fixation in Medicago truncatula microoxic nodules.

item.title: MtMIF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MTR_4g127360 Gene Symbol: MtMIF3 Gene Name: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor 3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor MtMIF3 prevents the premature aging of Medicago truncatula nodules.

item.title: MtMOT1.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtMOT1.3 Gene Name: Molybdate Transporter type 1.

item.title: MtNFH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g116990.1 Gene Symbol: MtNFH1|MtChit5 Gene Name: NOD FACTOR HYDROLASE1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Role of the Nod Factor Hydrolase MtNFH1|MtChit5 in Regulating Nod Factor Levels during Rhizobial Infection and in Mature Nodules of Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020.1 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtNRT2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr4g0028551.1 Gene Symbol: MtNRT2.1 Gene Name: Genome: M.

item.title: MtYSL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g092090 Gene Symbol: MtYSL3 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula Yellow Stripe1-Like3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtYSL3 is a plasma membrane protein expressed by vascular cells in roots and nodules and by cortical nodule cells.

item.title: MtZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtZR1 Gene Name: PRAF family Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtZR1, a PRAF protein, is involved in the development of roots and symbiotic root nodules in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: NCR169
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g029760 Gene Symbol: NCR169 Gene Name: nodule-specific cysteine-rich 169 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Widely conserved AHL transcription factors are essential for NCR gene (NCR169) expression and nodule development in Medicago.

item.title: NPF7.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Mtr.27727.1 Gene Symbol: NPF7.6 Gene Name: Genome: JCVI Mt 4.

item.title: PanNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PanWU01x14_292800 Gene Symbol: PanNOOT1 Gene Name: PanNODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Parasponia andersonii Functional Descriptions: PanNOOT1 is orthologous to Arabidopsis thaliana BLADE-ON-PETIOLE1 (AtBOP1) and AtBOP2, which are involved in the meristem-to-organ-boundary maintenance.

item.title: PvRbohB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Phvulv091013731 Gene Symbol: PvRbohB Gene Name: NADPH oxidase gene Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: RbohB, a Phaseolus vulgaris NADPH oxidase gene, enhances symbiosome number, bacteroid size, and nitrogen fixation in nodules and impairs mycorrhizal colonization.

item.title: ST6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g107810 Gene Symbol: ST6 Gene Name: Specific tissue protein 6 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Specific tissue proteins 1 and 6 are involved in root biology during normal development and under symbiotic and pathogenic interactions in Medicago truncatula.
